page.title: 08Friends and hobbies.
page.content: Lee Turpin goes fishing with David Richardson. David likes to play with his technical lego. Lee goes BMX racing on his Amico Team Pro BMX. He has l0 trophies. Hugh Thomas' hobbies include BMX cycle racing. He has won l0 cups. He goes racing on Sundays. Martin Hewett has won l0 trophies also. He likes watching "Street Hawk". He lives in a converted barn.David lives in a council house in Summerhill. His parents pay for the house. He likes drawing homework and spellings. Gareth John is his friend. He likes going to the beach to catch crabs and shrimps. He brings shells home to paint. Howard lives in Llanteg. His hobbies are football and cricket. He likes doing maths. He used to live in Edgington in England and he says that England is much different from Wales.
